author: rfeng
msg: Port the core SPIs to use the new assembly model

author: sctemme
msg: Move the thread locking upcall initialization before the hardware library init,
so the hardware library can pick up the locking callbacks. Fixes PR 20951.
Tested on Linux with trunk and an nCipher nShield card, and on Solaris 10/Sparc
